segments.text: Oh , not too bad . I'm just glad the weekend's finally here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know what you mean . What can I get for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Give me a screwdriver on the rocks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One screwdriver , coming right up . ( He mixes the drink . ) Here you are , sir .
segments.speaker: S1
